about_the_game:
Experience a sci-fi narrative where you run a gas station on a drifting asteroid in the infinite void. Service increasingly complex alien ships, upgrade and expand your gas station's operations, and shape the fate of the galactic stage through your choices!




Begin by simply refueling alien ships, before widening your range of services, to complete the more complex amenities that such ships require. Complete these tasks as quickly and efficiently as possible to make as much money as possible before the day ends.




Your strategic decisions and interactions will influence the larger narrative, presenting unique challenges and opportunities. As you manage the daily operations and engage with diverse characters, you'll uncover secrets and navigate the intricate web of interstellar politics.



At the end of each day, you must pay dues to the Galactic Gas Federation, an agency of gas station owners that have unionized. The Galactic Gas Federation attempts to protect gas station owners from the nefarious evil-doers of the galaxy, unless you don’t pay your dues.
detailed_description:
WISHLIST INTERDIMENSIONAL GAS STATION NOW


About the Game

Experience a sci-fi narrative where you run a gas station on a drifting asteroid in the infinite void. Service increasingly complex alien ships, upgrade and expand your gas station's operations, and shape the fate of the galactic stage through your choices!




Begin by simply refueling alien ships, before widening your range of services, to complete the more complex amenities that such ships require. Complete these tasks as quickly and efficiently as possible to make as much money as possible before the day ends.




Your strategic decisions and interactions will influence the larger narrative, presenting unique challenges and opportunities. As you manage the daily operations and engage with diverse characters, you'll uncover secrets and navigate the intricate web of interstellar politics.



At the end of each day, you must pay dues to the Galactic Gas Federation, an agency of gas station owners that have unionized. The Galactic Gas Federation attempts to protect gas station owners from the nefarious evil-doers of the galaxy, unless you don’t pay your dues.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M / Intel Iris Pro 5200 or Apple M1
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Apple M2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M395X / Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Interdimensional Gas Station

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Experience a sci-fi narrative where you run a gas station on a drifting asteroid in the infinite void. Service increasingly complex alien ships, upgrade and expand your gas station's operations, and shape the fate of the galactic stage through your choices!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish
